nodes.bodyText: wallcontroller isn't a valid item-type

@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
+<thing:thing-descriptions bindingId="touchwand"

+			</channel>
+		</channels>
+	</thing-type>
+	<channel-type id="wallaction">
